author: wsmoak
msg: First pass at SHALE-221 to allow compilation against the RI for JSF 1.2.
For now, use the available snapshots, and JSP 2.1 from Mortbay.
Additionally, move the jsp-api dependency into the myfaces and jsfri profiles so that only one of JSP 2.0 or 2.1 is selected.

author: craigmcc
msg: [SHALE-223] Make the test work against both JSF RI and MyFaces 1.1.
There is a difference in the two implementations on whether a DOM
element for an <h:messages> component gets created when there are no
actual messages, so we cannot assume one way or the other.

author: danj
msg: patch from Andrew Eberbach - the FileUtils.loadFromContext() method is used by the new components in muse-tools (MUSE-24).
